resources.string: Shri. Someshwar Shikshan Prasarak Mandals Sharadchandra Pawar College of Engineering and Technology, Someshwarnagar established in 2012, is one of the self-financed Engineering colleges approved by AICTE New Delhi, Government of Maharashtra and DTE Mumbai. The institute is affiliated to Savitribai Phule Pune University (SPPU). The institute offers Engineering Courses in Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Engineering and Electrical Engineering leading to BE degree as per SPPU University Curriculum.
Sharadchandra Pawar College of Engineering and Technology, Someshwarnagar
